title: Ambient Video Game Music - Farms
description: Experience the enchanting tranquility of the countryside with our collection of 10 ambience tracks.
longDescription:
Experience the enchanting tranquillity of the countryside with our collection of 10 ambience tracks, meticulously curated to capture the authentic essence of life on a farm. This assortment, specifically designed for game developers, brings to life the heart-warming sounds of chickens, cows, sheep, and goats, the peaceful chirping of birds nestled in nearby bushes, all harmoniously tied together with a carefully crafted track.


Each track in this collection is a symphony of rural simplicity and charm. Immerse yourself in the distinctive clucks of chickens, the low moos of cows, the soft bleating of sheep, and the light-hearted bleats of goats. These distinct sounds, captured with great attention to detail, provide an immersive experience, taking players on an aural journey to a lively farm setting.


Nestled within this rural orchestra are the soothing songs of birds, adding an additional layer of tranquillity to the soundscape. Their melodious chirping from the nearby bushes accentuates the serene atmosphere, further enhancing the overall gaming experience.


This collection is an invaluable resource for game developers looking to imbue their projects with a robust and realistic rural atmosphere. With the animal noises, bird songs, and unifying track, you can bring a sense of rustic charm to your gaming environment, making it more immersive and enjoyable for players. Transport your players to the heart of the countryside, allowing them to fully experience the captivating allure of life on a farm.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
technicalDetails:

Number of cues: 10
